review.title: “Danieli”
review.pros: Pros – Very big leader firm, doing business all over the world.You can gain a lot of experience in brief time, that you can easily spend in future jobs.It's quite easy to be hired; you do not need to be an excellence.
review.cons: Cons – There is not much meritocracy. As a consequence, employees are generally badly motivated because not properly rewarded if they do well their job. Moreover, there is often a surprisingly disorganization and lack of necessary informations from bosses.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You should apply more meritocracy and reserve much more consideration to the employees.Training of employees should be much more improved.

review.title: “Danieli & C. - pro and cons of a company from Friuli”
review.pros: Pros – One of the top construction companies in Italy, first class world player in Steelmaking plant business. Very good organisation.You can see the world and be involved in huge projects
review.cons: Cons – "Furlan" company. very strong reginal link (good if you are from Friuli). career progress possibility only up to a certain level. good large family business, but still a family business in terms of management.strong centralisation of power.Taylorism applied to engineering and construction: it's amazing how good it works for the company, a bit less exiting for employees.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – a more widespread managerial culture (particularly within the subsidiaries) and more transparency in goals and strategies would be usefull to polarize employees efforts.
